trans-unit.source: Running the Network Server under the security manager

seg-source.mrk: Running the Network Server under the security manager

target.mrk: Running the Network Server under the security manager

trans-unit.source: By default, the Network Server boots with a Basic security policy. You are encouraged to customize this policy to fit the security needs of your application and its runtime environment.

seg-source.mrk: By default, the Network Server boots with a Basic security policy.
You are encouraged to customize this policy to fit the security needs of your application and its runtime environment.

target.mrk: By default, the Network Server boots with a Basic security policy.
You are encouraged to customize this policy to fit the security needs of your application and its runtime environment.

trans-unit.source: You may also run the Network Server without a security manager, although this is not recommended.

seg-source.mrk: You may also run the Network Server without a security manager, although this is not recommended.

target.mrk: You may also run the Network Server without a security manager, although this is not recommended.
